text:
twago (http://www.twago.com) is hiring in Berlin, Germany:

- Principal DevOps Engineer

Our small team is seeking a new colleague to help us deliver and run the next generation of our web platform.

http://www.twago.com/blog/principal-devops-engineer/ join-our-team[_at_]twago.com

twago is Europe's leading platform for connecting clients with contractors.

Interviews available immediately for qualified candidates with right-to-work in Germany / EU
